SEARCH
Package io.github.vitalforge.persistlib.data.clarification

Annotation Interface PersistClass

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(TYPE) public @interface PersistClass
Annotation to mark a class for persistence operations. This annotation is retained at runtime and can be used on classes. The methods() attribute determines whether the methods of the annotated class should be considered for persistence operations. The fields() attribute determines whether the fields of the annotated class should be considered for persistence operations. The pendingParameters() attribute is not recommended for use. Instead, use the PersistField annotation.
